--willEmployessLoginToProductOrService--: Will {{name}} employees login to the product or service?
--implementSetupOrConfigureThisProduct--: Will non-employees such as contractors use this product or need access to other company systems to implement, setup or configure this product?
--itSecurityDataAccessSystemIntegration-: IT SECURITY - DATA ACCESS & SYSTEM INTEGRATION
--needAccessToCompanySensitiveDate--: Will the use of this supplier’s product and/or services need access to {{name}} sensitive company data?
--customerDetailsFinanceDataEmployeeData: (e.g. Customer details, Finance data or Employee data)
--integrateWithAccessData--: Will this supplier’s product and/or services integrate with or access data from business-critical systems at {{name}}?
--willSupplierCreateIntellectualProperty: Will the supplier create intellectual property and by-products for this project which {{name}} needs to own?
--contentDesignGraphicArtSoftwareSurveyR: (e.g Content, design, graphic, art work, infographic, software, survey or research reports)
--accessToCompanyIpProsprietaryData--: Access to company IP & proprietary data
--accessToIntellectualProperty--: Will this supplier be given access to {{name}}'s intellectual property, or proprietary data to deliver this project?
--AreYouOkWithsupplierRefrencing--: Are you OK with the supplier referencing {{name}}  by name as a client, using the {{name}} logo in customer references, websites or events?
